original_text: Blind people can now see again. People who could not walk can now walk again. People who had a bad disease of the skin are now well again. Deaf people can now hear again. People who had died now live again. Poor people are hearing God's good news.
korean_text: 맹인이 보며 못 걷는 사람이 걸으며 나병환자가 깨끗함을 받으며 못 듣는 자가 들으며 죽은 자가 살아나며 가난한 자에게 복음이 전파된다 하라

sentences.original_text: Blind people can now see again
sentences.korean_translation: 소경들이 이제 다시 볼 수 있게 되었고

sentences.original_text: People who could not walk can now walk again
sentences.korean_translation: 걷지 못하던 사람들이 이제 다시 걸을 수 있게 되었고

sentences.original_text: People who had a bad disease of the skin are now well again
sentences.korean_translation: 나병에 걸렸던 사람들이 이제 다시 깨끗하게 되었고

sentences.original_text: Deaf people can now hear again
sentences.korean_translation: 귀머거리들이 이제 다시 들을 수 있게 되었고

sentences.original_text: People who had died now live again
Poor people are hearing God's good news
sentences.korean_translation: 가난한 사람들이 하나님의 좋은 소식을 듣고 있다
